articles.title: Risk of reinfection high with Omicron variant of Covid-19: South African study - India Today
articles.description: A study conducted by South African researchers on the basis of surveillance data has found that there is an increased risk of Covid-19 reinfection associated with the new Omicron variant of coronavirus.

articles.author: Maggie Fox and Jamie Gumbrecht, CNN
articles.title: South African researchers find evidence people more easily reinfected with Omicron variant than with other variants - CNN
articles.description: Researchers in South Africa reported Thursday they have found some evidence that people who had been infected once with coronavirus were more likely to be reinfected with the Omicron variant than with the Beta or Delta variants.
